roleset.name: treating with contempt
roleset.note: Added by Julia based on BOLT, deride.01. Corresponds to VNcls 33.

example.name: arg0
example.text: Britain had its boffins, working researchers subject to the derision of intellectual gentlemen.

example.name: Args 0 and 1
example.text: How can anyone forget his derision of the 47% who are trying to make ends meet everyday...
example.arg: of the 47% who are trying to make ends meet everyday

example.name: arg2
example.text: With some derision for the Bush administration's arguments, a three-judge panel said the government contended that its accusations against the detainee ...
